title: Authors and Citation
text: Du Y (2024). SGD: clustering evaluation metric spatial transcriptomics. R package version 0.1.0, https://yihdu.github.io/SGD.
code: @Manual{,   title = {SGD: A clustering evaluation metric for spatial transcriptomics},   author = {Yihang Du},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://yihdu.github.io/SGD}, }

title: About
text: install package GitHub, use following command:
code: # Install the package from GitHub if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("devtools") } devtools::install_github("YihDu/SGD")

title: About
text: SGD provides unbiased clustering evaluation metric spatial transcriptomics data. accounts label agreement clustering results ground truth, spatial label distribution, mislabel severity simultaneously.

title: About
text: true_labels : numeric factor Ground truth labels dataset. represent actual class labels wish compare predicted clusters. cluster_labels : numeric factor predicted labels clusters generated clustering algorithm. labels model outputs compared true labels. spatial_coordinates : matrix data.frame matrix data frame contains spatial positional coordinates data points. coordinates used account spatial relationships analysis. params : list (optional) list additional parameters control behavior function.
